Sentencas: In this paper, a new plasma spray technology working in low pressure condition has been successfully applied to deposit Li-x(Ni,Co)(y)O-2 catalyst/electrode layers for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers

Sentencas: The low pressure induced distinctive phenomena were illustrated for presenting the characteristics and advances of such coating technique.
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers

Sentencas: Micro-nano crystalline microstructure was generated on the plasma sprayed coatings simultaneously with phase transformation taking place.
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers

Sentencas: To study the effect of high temperature on such catalyst material, sintering experiments were carried out at 600-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers

Sentencas: The results show that the ratio of x/y decreased when increasing temperature and sintering time because of the degradation of Li from Li-x(Ni,Co)(y)O-2 phase.
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers

Sentencas: The catalytic property and stability of the Li-x(Ni,Co)(y)O-2 at various temperatures were also discussed.
Titulo: Plasma sprayed coatings for low-temperature SOFC and high temperature effects on Lix(Ni,Co)yO2 catalyst layers
